title: Score lifetime web hosting through iBrave for under $80 during our version of Prime Day
content:
Macworld

Web hosting fees have risen dramatically. Want a break from the high prices? Switching to iBrave Cloud Web Hosting may be your best bet, especially during Deal Days, our version of Prime Day. A lifetime subscription to this web hosting platform is only $79.97 (reg. $899) through October 15th.

iBrave is a 5-star rated web hosting service provider. With lifetime access, you’ll gain access to their feature-rich website builder, one-click WordPress installs, a user-friendly c-panel with over 80 apps, secure data centers, and much more. Plus, if you ever run into trouble, they have knowledgeable support staff available seven days a week to help you get back on track. 

It’s ideal for anyone who needs a website but has to stick to a budget. All you need to do is bring your own domain (you must already have one to activate hosting through iBrave), and from there, you’ll enjoy reliable web hosting for life. You’ll be able to host an unlimited number of websites, too!

Paying too much for your website? 

During Deal Days, get a lifetime subscription to iBrave Cloud Web Hosting, now just $79.97. No coupon is necessary, but this deal ends October 15th at 11:59pm Pacific!
